params.cbBTCReceived: The amount of cbBTC to deposit.

params.amountIn: The amount of tokenIn to swap.

returns.result: A BundlerResult struct containing initial and final cbBTC balances, and cbBTC received.

approveAndDepositTest((address,address,u.notice: Approves and deposits cbBTC into RiftExchange.

cbBTC().notice: Returns the address of the cbBTC token.

executeSwapAndDeposit(uint256,bytes,(add.notice: Executes the bundled transaction: 1. Transfers tokenIn via Permit2. 2. Swaps tokenIn to cbBTC. 3. Approves and deposits cbBTC into RiftExchange.

permit2().notice: Returns the address of the Permit2 contract.

riftExchange().notice: Returns the address of the RiftExchange contract.

swapRouter().notice: Returns the address of the swap router.

documentation.text: @notice Approves the swap router to spend up to `amount` of the tokenIn held by the Bundler.
